summary: A young man in a personal tailspin flees from US to Italy, where he sparks up a romance with a woman harboring a dark, primordial secret.
cast: Lou Taylor Pucci|Nadia Hilker|Francesco Carnelutti|Nick Nevern|Chris Palko|Jonathan Silvestri|Jeremy Gardner|Vinny Curran|Holly Hawkins|Augie Duke|Shane Brady|Vanessa Bednar|Kenzo Lee|Some Other Guy
title: Spring
